Class CollisionTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecs.Component
      • ecs.CollisionTrigger
  • public class CollisionTrigger
extends Component

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      EventNode<EventData.TriggerEnterEvent> onTriggerEnter
      This Event will fire when any AABB intersects with this trigger on the frame that it intersects
      EventNode<EventData.TriggerExitEvent> onTriggerExit
      This Event will fire when any AABB stops intersecting with this trigger on the frame that it exits
